main event: An unidentified object was observed as a point of light that gradually faded out of sight over a 20 minute period.
interesting points: The object was observed both visually and via ground radar., The object appeared as 4 or 5 lights of bronze to reddish color., It was initially spotted 5 degrees above the horizon and faded gradually while moving north., Multiple possible explanations for the sighting included balloon, aircraft, and astronomical phenomena., The observation took place at an FAA station in Hoquiam, Washington.
sighted object: point of light in the sky
